title: Godâ€™s Glory Fills the Temple
summary: Fire comes down from heaven to consume the offerings, and the glory of the Lord fills the temple. God appears to Solomon at night and confirms that He has chosen the temple. He also gives a promise and a warning about obedience and disobedience.

faq.question: What sign showed God's presence at the temple?
faq.answer: Fire from heaven and the glory of the Lord filled the temple.

faq.question: What promise did God give Solomon?
faq.answer: If the people humble themselves, pray, and turn from sin, God will forgive and heal their land.
